author: wmtan
body:
Trivial.
A recent PR #13820 replaced nearly all uses of std::auto_ptr in the framework with std::unique_ptr.
However, the documentation files (*.txt), a few comments in the C++ code, and an example script in FWCore/Skeletons were missed in that PR. This PR changes std::auto_ptr to std::unique_ptr in the documentation, comments, and the example script.
Should not affect anything, but since some of the comments are in C++ header files, it will cause a big rebuild.
title: Change auto_ptr to unique_ptr in text
